desc:1152575024:
Virulent Plague has a chance to abruptly flare up, dealing {1}% of the damage it dealt to target in the last {2} sec.

When this effect triggers, the duration of your active minions are increased by {3} sec, up to {4} sec.
desc:1541772342: Your Anti-Magic Shell shifts to match more of a Frost affinity.
desc:3292027531: While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by {1}% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by {2}%.
desc:3007602372: Scourge Strike deals {1}% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by {2} sec.
desc:3705326954:
Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For {1} sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by {2}%, you cannot be slowed below {3}% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
desc:278959988: When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by {1}% for {2} sec.
desc:43102455:
Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional {1}% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by {2} sec.
desc:2397063888: Your Anti-Magic Shell shifts to match more of a Blood affinity.
desc:4206536262: Your Raise Dead spell summons a geist instead of a ghoul.
desc:3932458747:
When you suffer a damaging effect equal to {1}% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at {2}% effectiveness. May only occur every {3} min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by {4} sec.
desc:58707688: Magic damage taken is reduced by {1}% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by {2}%.
desc:1575090700: Blood Plague deals its damage {1}% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Blood Plague.
desc:166031562:
While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at {1}% effectiveness.

You may only benefit from this effect every {2} sec.
desc:3080446216:
Marrowrend and Heart Strike have a {1}% chance to grant {2} stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for {3} sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
desc:2468714596:
Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing {1} Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After {2} sec or reaching {3} stacks, the mark explodes, dealing {4} damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below {5}% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for {6} min.
desc:2279471855:
If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by {1}%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by {2}%.
desc:1111257850: Your Path of Frost ability now looks a little cracked, just a little.
desc:165947738: While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by {1} sec, up to a maximum of {2} sec.
desc:1029707411: The damage of your diseases and Death Coil are increased by {1}%.
desc:4178556418: Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing {1} Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
desc:1195688809: Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by {1}% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by {2}% for {3} sec, up to {4} times.
desc:4184932403:
Blooddrinker and Consumption now contribute to your Mastery: Blood Shield.

Each time an enemy strikes your Blood Shield, the cooldowns of Blooddrinker and Consumption have a chance to be reset.
desc:1939771005: Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by {1}% and your Armor is increased by {2}%.
desc:831021349: Chains of Ice now also roots enemies for {1} sec but its cooldown is increased to {2} sec.
desc:3087785639:
Your auto attack damage is increased by {1}%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to {2} additional times.
desc:1421020086: Causes your Army of the Dead spell to summon an assortment of undead minions.
desc:1095068174:
Your Death Coil, Epidemic and Death Strike have a {1}% chance to make your next Scourge Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for {2}% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by {3}%, up to {4}% for {5} sec.
desc:2625703228:
Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by {1}%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases {2} nearby allies movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.
desc:619931218: Your Raise Dead spell summons a skeleton instead of a ghoul.
desc:1159003751:
Parrying an attack grants you a charge of Bloodied Blade, increasing your Strength by {1}%, up to {2}% for {3} sec.

At {4} stacks, your next parry consumes all charges to unleash a Heart Strike at {5}% effectiveness, and increases your Strength by {6}% for {7} sec.
desc:584068661: Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all {1} Horsemen to aid you for {2} sec.
desc:526689714:
Blood Boil deals {1}% increased damage, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies {2} stacks to Reaper's Mark and {3} stacks when it is a critical strike.
desc:4174703254: When you take damage, {1}% of the damage is redirected to each active horsemen.
desc:2286474236: Anti-Magic shell now removes all harmful magical effects when activated, but it's cooldown is increased by {1}  sec.
desc:2099369702: Essence of the Blood Queen stacks {1} additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by {2}% per stack.
desc:1669899842:
Reaper's Mark initial strike grants {1} charges of Bone Shield.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to {2}% increased damage based on your target's missing health.
desc:4199464301: Each time Frost Fever deals damage, {1}% of the damage dealt is gathered into the next cast of Remorseless Winter, up to {2} times.
desc:4250484147: When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains {1} [plural|stack|stacks] and infects another nearby enemy.
desc:1184887194: When Sudden Doom is consumed, you gain {1}% Strength for {2} sec.
desc:2019845556: Your diseases deal {1}% more damage and have a {2}% increased chance to critically strike.
desc:2670869538:
While Dancing Rune Weapon is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by {1}%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Heart Strike for the duration.
desc:4288433556:
When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Virulent Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by {1} sec, and deals {2}% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Scourge Strike consumes the disease to deal {3}% of their remaining damage to the target.
desc:2877727231: Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a {1}% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below {2}% health.
desc:647382523: While you have {1} or more Horsemen aiding you, your Runic Power spending abilities deal {2}% increased damage.
desc:1464368467:
Your Leech is increased by {1}%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by {2}%, and it affects {3} allies within {4} yds.
desc:2748329884: Consuming Sudden Doom calls upon a Magus of the Dead to assist you for {1} sec.
desc:2225502205: Casting Anti-Magic Shell grants {1} nearby allies a Lesser Anti-Magic Shell that Absorbs up to {2} magic damage and reduces the duration of harmful Magic effects against them by {3}%.
desc:616223679: When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals {1}% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal {2}% reduced Physical damage to you for {3} sec.
desc:2733699650: Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by {1} sec.
desc:3345046031: Scourge Strike shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing {1} Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by {2}% for {3} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.
desc:4235819107: Your Runic Power spending abilities have a chance to additionally deal {1}% of the damage dealt over {2} sec.
desc:3112196249: When Frost Strike consumes {1} Razorice stacks, it deals {2}% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
desc:1306248212:
Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for {1} sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:800864276: Dark Transformation also empowers your Gargoyle and Army of the Dead for {1} sec, increasing their damage by {2}%.
desc:1372060182: Dominates the target undead creature up to level {1}, forcing it to do your bidding for {2} min.
desc:930852904: Sudden Doom also causes your next Death Coil to burst up to {1} Festering Wounds and reduce the target's movement speed by {2}% per burst. Lasts {3} sec.
desc:2014475674: Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within {1} yd in front of you, dealing {2} Frost damage and slowing movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.
desc:2882184001: Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by {1}%, decaying by {2}% every sec.
desc:1427478: Sudden Doom triggers {1}% more often, can accumulate up to {2} charges, and increases the damage of your next Death Coil by {3}% or Epidemic by {4}%.
desc:2693535172: Heart Strike heals you for {1}% health for each enemy hit while affected by Blood Plague.
desc:1219687168: Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
desc:2984266516: An unholy strike that deals {1} Physical damage and {2} Shadow damage, and causes {3} Festering Wound to burst.
desc:3224941875: When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing {1} Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
desc:3239503674:
Your auto attacks have a {1}% chance to make your next Death Coil cost {2} less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst {3} Festering Wound.
desc:1094542641: Damage taken below {1}% Health is reduced by {2}%.
desc:3224152903: Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by {1} sec, but the amount of Marrowrends empowered by Exterminate is reduced by {2}.
desc:3040425762:
When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by {1}%.
desc:2022918598:
If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain {1}% Strength for {2} sec.

Wave of Souls is {3}% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.
